PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>

INSERT
	{ 	?s dcat:theme <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/data-theme/ENVI> .
		?s dgov:theme <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/34> }
WHERE
	{	?s a dcat:Dataset }
